keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Saudi Arabia has spent heavily to promote the radical form of Islam that inspired 9/11 and now inflames the Islamic State. Tiny Kosovo is a victim.

headline.print_headline: The World Reaps What the Saudis Sow
headline.main: The World Reaps What the Saudis Sow

snippet: Saudi Arabia has spent heavily to promote the radical form of Islam that inspired 9/11 and now inflames the Islamic State. Tiny Kosovo is a victim.
abstract: Editorial warns Saudi support of radical form of Sunni Islam known as Wahhabism in Kosovo threatens to undermine tiny nation's democracy and peace; supports actions by Kosovo government and United States to combat extremism, but laments that efforts have begun late and notes there is much to do.
